channel.title: Please Help ...OMG HELP~!@!@
channel.description:
Ok, I have posted like 3 threads and no body has helped. So please help me!
I downloaded mopar. NOW WHAT?
Do i need a new version of Java?
how do i get the mopar icon so i can extract the stuff from it?
I can get to the log-in page on the web client, then the port 43594 says something stupid and i cant get in.
Tell me what all i need so i can log on and play.
Someone please answer me..

item.title: Please Help ...OMG HELP~!@!@
item.dc:creator: @the_dude87 the_dude87
item.description:
@the_dude87 wrote:

I know…

I get the whole thing loaded and go to log in and it doesnt let me

says error connecting to server…

Thats whats ticking me off is i cant log in and no one is helping!
I just want to log onto morpar. Thats it.

Read full topic

item.title: Please Help ...OMG HELP~!@!@
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“the_dude87, post:3, topic:79197”]i just wana be able to log onto the default server and i cant.

I cant get the icon on my desktop where i can right click and extract the files.

Please help me :([br][size=1]Posted on: April 12, 2007, 09:42:34 PM[/size][hr]I can get to the log in screen. I click start server, place un and pass, and click enter and it says

‘error connecting to server, must be down’

God i wana play so bad![br][size=1]Posted on: April 12, 2007, 09:43:40 PM[/size][hr]please help :([/quote]
Please do not triple post. and all you have to do is install then double click and the client will start up.

Read full topic
